name: catchup-ai
readme:
# CatchUp AI (Recapped) - Unified Academic Workspace

A modern, AI-powered academic productivity platform that unifies notes, lectures, tasks, and calendar into a single, intelligent workspace. Built with Next.js 15, Chakra UI, Supabase, and Hugging Face AI.

**Codename**: Recapped / StudyFlow Unified

## ðŸŽ¯ Core Value Proposition

Stop juggling multiple apps. CatchUp AI integrates all your academic toolsâ€”notes, lectures, tasks, and schedulesâ€”intelligently into one workspace.

## âœ¨ Core Features

### Smart Notes
- Create and organize notes with rich text editing
- AI-powered key point extraction from lecture content
- Automatic flashcard generation from notes
- Concept graph visualization for understanding connections
- Tag-based organization and search

### Lecture Studio
